attributes.action: bring to an end all GP referrals to practitioners of all forms of complementary and alternative medicines.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is time to cease all NHS referrals to chiropractors,osteopaths and all other purveyors of quackery.The taxpayers cannot afford such foolish luxuries at the present time and the money saved on CAM would be better spent on tried and tested treatments that are currently subject to the postcode lottery.
